title: Overvest
description: abstract cross stitch patterns in red and green on white on square and rectangles covering vest; open front framed with 1-1/2\" commerical silk floral tape in pink and red; lined in white and blue check and black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
